price: 125. Yalli tirri haam faxa numuh islaamaninno noorih Alil (lubbi kinnuk) kaah farakka haa, Yalli cakki gitak makkoysam faxah yan numuk tirtoh oggoluk Alil kaak ceyissi haa Qaran gubaak iroh yawqe numuy ufuy edde yaadehinnah cakki oggolaamak Alil kaak edde yan ceyah gibdah Yalli koros lubbitte yaaminccnimik kah ceysennah, tonnaah Yalli isi nummaysewaa maral digaala haa.
arabic: فَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَهۡدِيَهُۥ يَشۡرَحۡ صَدۡرَهُۥ لِلۡإِسۡلَٰمِۖ وَمَن يُرِدۡ أَن يُضِلَّهُۥ يَجۡعَلۡ صَدۡرَهُۥ ضَيِّقًا حَرَجٗا كَأَنَّمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَجۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّجۡسَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
